headline: Howmet Aerospace Uses Debt To Pursue CAM Deal And Higher Aircraft Content
summary: Howmet Aerospace (NYSE:HWM) is pursuing the acquisition of Consolidated Aerospace Manufacturing, or CAM. The company plans to fund the deal with a mix of newly issued senior notes, commercial paper borrowings, and available cash. The transaction is positioned to broaden Howmet's presence across aerospace and defense customers and product lines. Howmet Aerospace focuses on engineered metal products for aerospace and industrial applications, so an acquisition like CAM fits closely with its...
